QuestData.Title: That Dangling Carrot
QuestData.Description: Grandpa always said, "Carrots ain't nothin but a welcomin' mat for virmen." I don't think I ever saw him grow a single carrot.$b$bFor once, I disagree with Grandpa. I like to live on the edge. Plus, I like to eat carrots.$b$bI like to eat carrots on the edge.$b$bCould you get some seeds and grow one for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Juicycrunch Carrot in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
